summary: Modularise preflight checks and schedule automated guard runs

steps.title: Design preflight module API
steps.notes: Extract objectives/authenticity/ethics/critic checks into a reusable package consumed by conductor and CI.

steps.title: Automate scheduled runs
steps.notes: Create a cron/CLI wrapper that executes preflight on a cadence and logs outcomes under `_report/usage/autonomy-preflight/`.

steps.title: Wire alerts into bus + status
steps.notes: Post bus events when preflight fails and surface the state in `teof status`.

checkpoint.description: Preflight runs unattended with receipts and bus alerts for failures
